Many species are nematophagous, forming adhesive knobs, nets or ring-like traps in the presence of a food source; perhaps a strategy for life in low-nitrogen environments. Many species are nematophagous, forming adhesive knobs, nets or ring-like traps in the presence of a food source; perhaps a strategy for life in low-nitrogen environments. There have been reports of associations with algae for a few species, but an established lichen association appears not to exist (Cannon & Kirk 2007),Cannon PF, Kirk PM. 2007. The history can be traced back Rinaldi et al. (2008) cited Agerer (2006), who cited Ingleby et al. (1990), a report that had been based upon a description of ECM formed by Tricharina gilva. ASV_3766,Fungi;Ascomycota;Orbiliomycetes;Orbiliales;Orbiliaceae;Retiarius;revayae,Orbiliaceae,9,Saprotroph,Wood Saprotroph,Microfungus,NULL,Probable,Saprobic, found especially on wood in both wet and dry habitats. Many species are nematophagous, forming adhesive knobs, nets or ring-like traps in the presence of a food source; perhaps a strategy for life in low-nitrogen environments. There have been reports of associations with algae for a few species, but an established lichen association appears not to exist (Cannon & Kirk 2007),Cannon PF, Kirk PM. 2007. Fungal Families of the World. CAB International, Cambridge (ISBN: 978-0851998275),,,,,

Many species are nematophagous, forming adhesive knobs, nets or ring-like traps in the presence of a food source; perhaps a strategy for life in low-nitrogen environments. There have been reports of associations with algae for a few species, but an established lichen association appears not to exist (Cannon & Kirk 2007),Cannon PF, Kirk PM. 2007. Many species are nematophagous, forming adhesive knobs, nets or ring-like traps in the presence of a food source; perhaps a strategy for life in low-nitrogen environments. There have been reports of associations with algae for a few species, but an established lichen association appears not to exist (Cannon & Kirk 2007),Cannon PF, Kirk PM. 2007.
